titleInfo.title: Experimental determination of the phase differences of continuum wavefunctions describing the photoionisation process of xenon atoms. I. Measurements of the spin polarisations of photoelectrons and their comparison with theoretical results
Journal of Physics B: Atomic, Molecular and Optical Physics
